page.title: 15RECREATION (West Block)
page.content: Many people would agree that Birchwood has been designed with some consideration given to{leisure time. Near the shopping parade is the {Leisure Centre}which functions as a public house with pool rooms and squash courts.Keep fit clubs meet there.Next to the centre is a{BMX {track}that attracts people from a large area.Nearby is a playing field. The shopping centre has an amusement arcade.There are{societies}such as Scouts & Guides similarly found in Skellingthorpe.Birchwood has a{Junior {Jazz band}which gives displays in the local area. There are 3 pubs,1 is large and holds club meetings and discos. Another has good garden facilities for children.Every Saturday there is a disco at the small hall next to St. Luke's church.
